rev.comment: /* Criticism and controversy */ Added limk to Google Earth
rev.diff:
Line 45: Line 45:
===Criticism and controversy===
===Criticism and controversy===
â
As it has grown, Google has found itself the focus of various controversies related to its business practices and services. For example, [[Google Print|Google Print's]] effort to digitize millions of books and make the full text searchable has led to [[copyright]] disputes with the [[Authors Guild]], Google's cooperation with the governments of China, France and Germany to filter search results in accordance to regional laws and regulations has led to claims of [[Google censorship|censorship]], a number of governments have raised concerns about security risks posed by the geographic details provided by Google Earth's satellite imaging [http://news.com.com/Indian+president+rails+against+Google+Earth/2100-1028_3-5896888.html?part=rss&tag=5896888&subj=news], and Google's persistent [[HTTP cookie|cookie]] and other information collection practices have led to concerns over user [[Google and privacy issues|privacy]].
+
As it has grown, Google has found itself the focus of various controversies related to its business practices and services. For example, [[Google Print|Google Print's]] effort to digitize millions of books and make the full text searchable has led to [[copyright]] disputes with the [[Authors Guild]], Google's cooperation with the governments of China, France and Germany to filter search results in accordance to regional laws and regulations has led to claims of [[Google censorship|censorship]], a number of governments have raised concerns about security risks posed by the geographic details provided by [[Google Earth|Google Earth's]] satellite imaging [http://news.com.com/Indian+president+rails+against+Google+Earth/2100-1028_3-5896888.html?part=rss&tag=5896888&subj=news], and Google's persistent [[HTTP cookie|cookie]] and other information collection practices have led to concerns over user [[Google and privacy issues|privacy]].
:''See also: [[History of Google#Criticism and controversy|History of Google: Criticism and controversy ]]''
:''See also: [[History of Google#Criticism and controversy|History of Google: Criticism and controversy ]]''
